sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMDROOG a hill-fortress of Hindustan, in the province of Bejapoor, situated on the north side of the Mal-purba river. It was taken from the Mahrattas 1 in 1785, by Tippoo Sultan, but w>as restored to them after the war of 1793.
